item.title: MSc Thesis
item.description: I conducted my MSc thesis at the Environmental Economics and Natural Resources Group at Wageningen University & Research. I did fieldwork in Costa Rica, where I interviewed pineapple farmers, researchers, and government officials. I studied the current state of pineapple leaves valorisation in Costa Rica, analyzed the barriers preventing the adoption of valorisation processes and the transition to a circular bioeconomy, and proposed a Facility Location Problem optimization model to improve the current situation.
